=
this if from GoInit.h , no parameters to the function:
////////////////////=
/////////////
/** Initialization of module Go.
    Must be called after SgI=
nit.
    @throws SgException on failure.
*/
void GoInit();
////////////////=

and within PyHyperNEAT.cpp, GoInit() function is called=
 with 1 parameter:
//////////////////////////////////
void initializeHyperN=
EAT()
{
    char str[1024];
    initcake(str);
    SgInit();
    GoInit(HCU=
BE::NUM_THREADS);
}
//////////////////////////////////

so i removed the pa=
rameter and it compiled.
The problem now is , that on linux the fuego libra=
ry does not compile as shared, so i can't compile the Neat Visualizer becau=
se it depends on Fuego. I think i will have to comment all the go-related l=
ines as a workaround.
